strip-ansi

Strip ANSI escape codes

Install

sh $ npm install --save strip-ansi

Usage

```js var stripAnsi = require(‘strip-ansi’);

stripAnsi(‘\x1b[4mcake\x1b[0m’); //=> ‘cake’ ```

CLI

sh $ npm install --global strip-ansi

```sh $ strip-ansi –help

Usage $ strip-ansi > $ cat | strip-ansi >

Example $ strip-ansi unicorn.txt > unicorn-stripped.txt ```
